title: How to Have a Really Fun Capture the Flag Nerf War

steps.headline: Get at least 5 other friends who like Nerf guns.
Make sure you have a place such as a backyard, large living room, or somewhere where you can play without being interrupted, but make sure it is large enough to accommodate the number of people.
steps.description: The more hallways or obstacles, the better.

steps.headline: Make sure each person has at least two Nerf guns to use (1 primary, 1 backup)
Divide everybody into two teams.
steps.description: Make sure the teams ARE FAIR.

steps.headline: Pick one color for each team, but make sure they are opposites (like orange and blue, or purple and yellow) and give everybody an article of clothing (such as a shirt or hat) that is their team's color.
steps.description: Make sure it is prominent and clearly visible.

steps.headline: Make sure everyone knows the rules (see Tips section below), load the guns to full capacity, and start!
Have each team construct a base to hide a flag (of the team's color) in.
steps.description: Make sure the bases are on opposite sides of the play area.
